ActIndian Act
SubjectTransfer of administration and control of lands within a reserve - Alberta
PrecisOrder to a) consent to the exercise of the power of the Province of Alberta to take lands in STURGEON LAKE Indian Reserve NÂ° 154, in the Province of Alberta, pursuant to subsection 35(1) of the Indian Act; and b) authorize, in lieu of such taking, the transfer of administration and control of the required lands, pursuant to subsection 35(3) of the Indian Act.
